titles.title: Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark Act
Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark Act
To designate the Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark Act - Designates the Ludlow Tent Colony Site (a site where striking miners and their families lived during the 1913-1914 Colorado coal strike) in Las Animas County, Colorado, as the "Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark."
